Package engine.rendering

Classes for rendering graphics.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ArrayBitmap.IVisitor
    Interface for visiting every pixel in an ArrayBitmap.
    IDisplay
    Interface for a display system showing the game.
    IRenderContext
    Interface that specifies higher-level rendering functions for a rendering device.
    IRenderDevice
    Interface for some piece of hardware, physical or virtual, that is capable of graphics rendering.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArrayBitmap
    Stores images in an array of 32-bit ARGB pixels.
    Color
    Represents a Color.
    Dither
    Holds various functions used for Dithering.
    LightMap
    A texture storing lighting information.
    RenderContext
    An implementation of higher-level rendering functions.
    RenderTarget
    Represents a location that can be rendered to by a particular IRenderDevice
    SpriteSheet
    A 2D sheet containing various sprites.
    Texture
    Represents a renderable texture.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    IRenderDevice.BlendMode
    Specifies a way of blending graphics.

Package engine.rendering Description

Classes for rendering graphics.
